name: REKTANGLES
description:
REKTANGLES

MINIMALIST STYLE FIGHTING GAME

Play with your friend and get REKT!

Play as the two mighty rectangles - BLUE and PINK and prepare to wreck the opponent and score some points!

Jump on top of your opponent and make them the REKTangle!

Play on 7 different arenas randomly chosen each time you play to spice up your competition and bring some more variety into it.

Controls: Mouse and keyboard
  • Blue can slide using A and D keys and jump using the W key
  • Pink can slide using LEFT  and RIGHT arrow keys and jump using the UP arrow key
Gamepad
  • Both players can slide using the LEFT STICK or LEFT and RIGHT keys on the D-Pad and jump using the A button (Xbox) / X button (Playstation) / B button (Nintendo)
What to expect in future updates?
  • More unique arenas
  • Music (perhaps)
